评论概述: Elegant, comfortable, versatile dress, highly recommend!
评论详情: I bought this in black for a black, very expensive wedding. I received so many compliments and my a few people complimented me on this.. They thought it was the most elegant dress far surpassing some of the very expensive gowns at this wedding.  I had to have it shortened a little as I bought it in a 4 but not in a 4P.  I danced all night in this, very comfortable, and I look forward to wearing it to other formal events.  It looks way more expensive than it was.
This dress is beautiful! It was so comfortable; not itchy or stiff. The slot on the arm isn’t too large.  I am only 5’4” and it wasn’t to long and didn’t need any alterations.
Purchase the dress for my kids' holiday celebration.  It fits comfortably and received nice compliments.
This dress is even better than the photos.  Would highly recommend.
This dress was even more stunning in person!  Received so many compliments!
just what I wanted for my grand daughters wedding
This dress was way too big on me, and I ordered a small. As far as the style, if you want a "grandma" dress, this is the one for you!
Not bad. Color was nice and it fit as expected. Ultimately I  returned it because I didn't like the way it looked on me.
Wrong color. Easy return.
Don’t wear dresses very often but loved design, color and fit of this dress.  Great quality for the money
The dress is really beautiful and and the fitting is awesome
Was for myself for a wedding but was too big.
Dress did not look good on me and not the right color.

This company is very popular with sequins! The colors are lovely and the quality is great for the price. The fit is true to size ~ be sure to pay attention to the stretch factor if that’s what you’re looking for. I’m very pleased with my choice. I have ordered a 2nd & 3rd items!
This cut of the dress is very flattering, material is medium weight and very comfortable . I love the material it feels great and not see through ! Perfect party dress! 🤩 👗

This simple, classy black dress is just right for a modest, fun night out. The fabric is good quality, though not as luxurious as it looks in the photos, yet still nice. It is light weight and has a little stretch in the bust, size is just enough to work for my 38 DD bust.

Love the fit and sparkles of this dress. It is a modest and elegant piece. The 3/4 slit sleeves are flattering as well. The skirt is flowy and lightweight. This dress competes with another dress from Grace Karin for a ballet performance I will be attending in December.

I wore this to my son’s wedding. I had 4 dresses I showed my daughter in law and had her pick which one she wanted me to wear. She chose this one and it was the perfect choice. It was actually my first choice too but my husband wanted me to wear a sexier dress. I didn’t think the occasion called for sexy, I thought it called for class and keeping attention on the bride. This dress is such a flattering fit though that I do think it’s sexy without being too much. It was very comfortable. The sequin top part is gorgeous and the bottom part is flowy and pretty. The material has some stretch to it for curvier areas. Excellent quality. I love this dress.
I like the product but came in too late for my Granddaughter’s wedding.  I will save it for future use.
The dress fit perfectly and is very pretty

评论概述: Very pretty formal dress that falls mid-lower leg.
评论详情: The dress fits according to sizing.  It is made with a stretchable material. The bottom flares with no cling.  Nice dress for a special occassion. Good price for a formal dress.

Wore this dress for my daughters wedding. Received so many compliments. The length on me was more a tea length. At first I didn’t think I would like the length but it turned out to be the perfect length.  Very comfortable and a great dress for the price!
The sequin material is nice not wrinkle resistant, lools roomy and comfortable, fabric light weight, the color is a brown familly, decent material quality but the split sleeve was my favorite part.

The dress itself arrived in a clear plastic bag.  I ordered the size M for my mom and it fits her.  However, the color doesn’t seem to fit her.  She has dark yellow skin tone.  It would be a good color for people with lighter skin tune for dark skin tune.  The material quality is pretty decent.
It fits a bit snugger than I would like even though I used the sizing guide. I like the dress and the price was right so I am going to keep the dress.

评论概述: Versatile and True-to-Size Dress for Any Climate
评论详情: Following the seller's size chart, I ordered a size small, and the dress fits perfectly true to size. The mid-length sleeves make it versatile for both warm and cooler climates. The material is thick but not heavy, and the top portion, including the arm slits, fits comfortably and looks flattering. With solid stitching and hems, this dress is well-made and a great choice. Highly recommend!

I was ready to return the dress, then I tried it on. It’s gorgeous and subtle even thought the sequins add a touch of flare. Highly recommend. True to size. I got it in the berry color and am a blonde. Wow! My husband said wow!
The sequences are plastic and glued on. Cheap looking and would need a belt or sash to dress up the waist. I returned it.

This is a nice dress for in formal occasion. This dress would be great for your next holiday party. The fit is true to size, I ordered a medium (the size I usually order) and it fits perfect. There is a stretch in the fabric and I was able to put it on and take it off without using the zipper. I am short, 5'2, and this dress hits about 2 inches above the floor.

This dress is absolutely gorgeous. It’s beautifully made, with great attention to detail. The design is elegant and in trend. The slit in the sleeve is a nice touch added movement and accent to a somewhat conservative style. The dress is light and fits loosely. I received many compliments from both men and women. The dress fits true to size. Definitely recommend!

评论概述: Beautiful dinner dress formal or semi-formal
评论详情: This dress was a nice surprise. It's often difficult to find this nice of a fit on formal and semi-formal clothing on line. We ordered a large for the 5'7" wife of approximately 175 pounds. It fit beautifully. It is neither snug nor loose. It drapes beautifully when standing and doesn't hug the chest, stomach or legs when sitting. It's comfortable and elegant. The blue is a beautiful, rich tome of blue. It's perfect for a dinner date or a wedding.

GRACE KARIN Sequin Dress for Women 2024 Mother of The Bride Dresses Wedding Guest Formal Chiffon Evening Gown  Absolutely stunning  This is an absolutely stunning sequin dress in formal chiffon. It has no loose threads or crooked seams. It fits true to size and is comfortable.  The sequins are gorgeous and it covers everything that needs to be covered. I requested this for my elderly mom and she loves it so much. She is sick and we won’t be going anywhere for new years but we will be dressing up to sit around and feel beautiful. This dress is gorgeous, it makes her happy and I’m getting priceless memories with my mom.  Highly recommend.
Can't wait to wear this to a holiday party! Cute. Comfortable. Priced right!

For reference: I am 5'8", 190ish lbs, 36DD, pear shape, 37" waist, 45" hips. I ordered the Black Grace Karin Sequin Dress in an XL and it is a comfortable fit. It is neither too loose nor too tight. There's some stretch to the waistline for plenty of breathing room. The dress is lined and not scratchy at all. The top of the dress sits well and is not restrictive. The zipper works great and I have had no issues with it sticking. The main thing to note is the length, it is a longer dress and may not work as hoped for shorter ladies. Overall, I am very pleased with this dress. I find it both flattering and comfortable. A win win, especially when you are on the larger side of the scale. Looking forward to wearing this at an upcoming event.

评论概述: Grace Karin never fails to produce a great product!
评论详情: This is a beautiful dress.  I love the rich blue color and the elegance of the sequins paired with chiffon on the bottom.  It fits true to size and is very flattering.  The open-upper-arm sleeves give it a touch of modernity on an otherwise elegant gown.  The waist is elastic, but the top is fancy enough with the sequins that the elastic waist doesn't make the gown look cheap.  This would work well for any formal occasion or wedding.

This is a gorgeous dress, and far more flattering on than off. Would be great for a cruise ship - and my daughter is actually thinking of wearing it for prom, it's that nice. Beautiful cut, design, and fit. Could not love this dress more. She's a small and it fits her to a tee.  Highly, highly recommended.

This is a beautiful dress. I love how it has the 3/4th sleeves. The fabric is really good. It is perfect to wear at any party or a formal get together. I love the blue color and how it fits. It’s very elegant and stylish. I’m just waiting for an event where I can wear it. I definitely recommend this dress.
Obnoxious and not pretty. The length is all the way to my ankles... The fit isn't flattering and the shoulders don't work. Everything about it is wrong and shapeless..

Love this dress, so pretty and flattering.  Grace Karin quality.  True to size.  I'm on the bigger side of medium (lower half), and medium fits me well.  Top part is stretchy as well as waist beltline part. Shoulder seams/cold shoulders are in the right places.  Perfect for special occasions, weddings, and  holidays!

I love dress that makes me feel dressy while still being comfortable! Lightweight fabric with a flow feel, comfortable fit, and well stitched. The color is true and the sequins are secure and attractively patterned.

This dress is gorgeous! Unfortunately, I ordered the wrong size and it is way too big. I ordered 2XL. I could probably have worn XL and maybe even L. I love this brand and this dress is very good quality.  The pattern of the sequins is really pretty. The dress is fully lined and is very comfortable. It is 100% worth the price.

I am 5 ft 5 and 240 lbs. I normally wear a 2XL, and that is the size I ordered. It fits me very well.  I wanted a dress with sequins that was more appropriate for fall and winter, and saw this one. It fits the bill, though is a bit more matronly than the clothing I normally wear. But the slits in the sleeves help make it a little more modern.  It is flattering to my body type (large stomach), and very comfortable to wear. It has a stretchy waist and upper part, so I was able to put it on and take it off without unzipping it.  It won't be my favorite dress, but it'll be a nice one for formal occasions in the fall and winter.

The GRACE KARIN Sequin Dress in the Color: “Rose Pink” is AMAZING!!!  I ordered size Small and the fit is great! For reference I’m 5’2”, short torso, small chested, and weigh 114 pounds. I was worried that the waist portion of the dress would fall in the wrong placement but I was pleasantly surprised to see how beautiful the whole dress flows… The length is perfect!!! Since I’m short it is very long but I really like it this long. It feels comfortable to wear, exceptional quality, soft fabric. I truly love the color!!! It’s lovely and delicate!!!  I’m so glad I got this Fabulous dress!!!  It’s worth the investment for the product you get!!!  I definitely recommend it…

This dress is absolutely beautiful. The material is very soft and very well designed and tailored. Looks as if it will not wrinkle. I love the way it fits and the elegance of it. I absolutely love it!

It isn’t as shapely as I thought from the pic but works well enough and is made well. The sparkles are pretty and they seem well attached. The sleeves are very bluntly cut and the waist is just elastic so was hoping for a bit more. Still pretty but not quite as much as I hoped

This lovely Grace Karin sequin dress is a great option for a wedding or any formal occasion. The gown comes true to size and is very figure-flattering. It comes in several lovely classic colors like champagne gold, navy blue, rose pink, and red wine. It does match the traditional patterns for mother-of-the-bride dress, but it is not limited to that occasion. The sleeves come with a slit, and that might be the only area where it doesn’t come across as traditional as one would expect. However, it is still a tasteful style, and a good value for the cost.
Great dress.  Got it for a cocktail party.  Wasn't sure about the size, but it was true to size.

评论概述: Wear this when you're ready to sparkle
评论详情: This dress is gorgeous, without a doubt.  You'll be the envy of all the ladies when you show up in this outfit.  The sequined top with the split sleeves will draw all the eyes towards you!!  The elastic in the attached skirt ensures it is held tight to you.  Just pull the skirt up to whatever length suits you and let the blouse potion glide over it.  You're gonna love this outfit!!!

I cannot begin to tell you how gorgeous this dress is.  I was a tab bit skeptical in ordering, but I reviewed the website's information regarding this dress.  I wanted something different as I'm attending a "Formal Affair" with about 300 invitee's in September and I wanted to look dazzling.  Well, when I opened the package and saw how pretty this dress is , I knew I made the right decision.  It's made of a very nice stretchy material which will allow room for comfortable dancing and of course eating (LOL).  It flows very well at the bottom and I cannot wait to wear this gorgeous dress at the event.  It's also very dressy for other formal attire venues.
Super nice and soft durable material.  Fits well and love the color scheme.  Looks expensive.
